div.div: at North Manchester, IN | Burt Field

tr.td: MU wins toss - defers to 2nd half - MU to kick off
Andrew Coe kickoff 49 yards to the FC16, Alex Smith return 14 yards to the FC30 (Tyler Pruitt).
Chase Burton pass complete to L. Wroblewski for 23 yards to the MU47 (Quantae Miller).
L. Wroblewski rush for 17 yards to the MU30, out-of-bounds (Nathan Birk).
